parameters.name: FinId
parameters.description: Fin ID of the fin from which you want to return the vertices

title: ITessellation.IGetFinVertices
description: Gets the IDs of the two vertices that correspond to a fin.

parameters.name: FinId
parameters.description: Fin ID of the fin from which you want to return the vertices

returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of two longs or integers describing the vertices IDs of a fin VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
